QueryDefinition.Query:
SELECT distinct patid, 32813 type_concept_id, last_day(cast(extract_ym || '01' as date)) date, case when d_education_level_code = 'A' then 'Less than 12th Grade' when d_education_level_code = 'B' then 'High School Diploma' when d_education_level_code = 'C' then 'Less than Bachelor Degree' when d_education_level_code = 'D' then 'Bachelor Degree Plus' when d_education_level_code = 'U' then 'Unknown' end value_as_string_1, case when d_education_level_code = 'A' then 37079293 when d_education_level_code = 'B' then 37079292 when d_education_level_code = 'C' then 1621239 when d_education_level_code = 'D' then 1990213 when d_education_level_code = 'U' then 0 end value_as_concept_id_1, d_education_level_code source_value_1,
case when d_home_ownership_code = '1' then 'Probable Homeowner' when d_home_ownership_code = '2' then 'Probable Renter' when d_home_ownership_code = '0' then 'Unknown' end value_as_string_2, case when d_home_ownership_code = '1' then 4201839 when d_home_ownership_code = '2' then 4072617 when d_home_ownership_code = '0' then 0 end value_as_concept_id_2, d_home_ownership_code source_value_2,
case when d_household_income_range_code = '1' then '<$40K' when d_household_income_range_code = '2' then '$40K-$49K' when d_household_income_range_code = '3' then '$50K-$59K' when d_household_income_range_code = '4' then '$60K-$74K' when d_household_income_range_code = '5' then '$75K-$99K' when d_household_income_range_code = '6' then '$100K+' when d_household_income_range_code = '0' then 'Unknown' end value_as_string_3, case when d_household_income_range_code = '1' then 45883177 when d_household_income_range_code = '2' then 46237798 when d_household_income_range_code = '3' then 46237437 when d_household_income_range_code = '4' then 46237851 when d_household_income_range_code = '5' then 46237403 when d_household_income_range_code = '6' then 35819437 when d_household_income_range_code = '0' then 0 end value_as_concept_id_3, d_household_income_range_code source_value_3 FROM {sc}.ses JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND ses.PATID = ch.PERSON_ID order by PATID
